info.name: Journeys
info.summary: cluster images by time and location
info.description:
Clusters your images into journeys (vacations/trips) and creates albums for each journey. Requires Memories app.
OCC usage: php occ journeys:cluster-create-albums <user> [maxTimeGap] [maxDistanceKm] [minClusterSize]
Arguments: user The ID of the user for whom to cluster images and create albums. (required) maxTimeGap Max allowed time gap in hours (optional, default: 24) maxDistanceKm Max allowed distance in kilometers (optional, default: 100) minClusterSize Minimum images per cluster (optional, default: 3)
How time gap influences clustering: The maxTimeGap defines the largest allowed time (in hours) between two consecutive images for them to be grouped into the same journey. If the gap between two images exceeds this value, a new journey (album) is started. Smaller values create more, shorter journeys; larger values group more images together.
Example: php occ journeys:cluster-create-albums admin 24 100 5
